turns.model_response:
Keras is like an advanced toolkit that helps people create intelligent machines—those are computers or programs we call artificial intelligence (AI). Imagine you want a robot friend; using something called Artificial Intelligence can help design its brain so it learns and understands things, just as humans do.

Now think of building with LEGO bricks. Keras provides us with special instructions for different types of blocks that fit together to build the AI's 'brain'. These aren't actual LEGOs but more like digital components or patterns which we call neural networks—these are complex structures used by computers in learning tasks, such as recognizing pictures (like faces) from videos.

Keras makes it easier because it's user-friendly and works well with other tools. It's similar to having a LEGO set that comes ready-made for creating certain models; you don't have to make everything yourself—you can just follow the instructions provided or even start building your own designs if you're feeling adventurous!

Here's some positive feedback: Great job wanting to learn about Keras! Building AI is like crafting intricate digital sculptures—it's challenging, but also really rewarding. Keep going with that curiosity and enthusiasm; it's what helps us push forward in understanding how we can teach machines complex tasks through learning from examples just as humans do.
